glosses: An area in Tver Oblast, Russia where a significant share of population are Tver Karelians.
Tver (a city, the administrative center of Tver Oblast, Russia)
television program, television series, TV series
a TV figure (person known for appearances on TV)
to tweet, to post an update on Twitter.

words.etymology_text: From English tweet, with the w changed to v, as w is not a native Finnish letter.

glosses: Tver Karelian (member of a Karelian ethnic minority in Tver oblast in Russia)
Tver Karelian (of or pertaining to a Karelian ethnic minority in Tver oblast in Russia)

forms.form: Rare. Only used with substantive adjectives.
